                  java.lang.Integer randomLimit,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> optionalParams)
        Second constructor for WordLoader object. Mostly used for game's functionality
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        randomLimit - Number of random words which need to be generated for the game
        optionalParams - List of integers which represent the range of use frecuency of the words to be generated
